techmeme.title: India's Supreme Court strikes down a tribunal order that let Byju's settle debts with India's cricket board, pushing the edtech startup firmly toward insolvency (Bloomberg)
An interview with Craig Federighi on the launch of Apple Intelligence features like notification summaries in iOS 18.1, Siri, Apple's AI strategy, and more (Joanna Stern/Wall Street Journal)
Sources: Shein's revenue growth slowed to 23% YoY to $18B in H1 2024 and its profit declined 70%+ YoY to just under $400M, as competition with Temu intensifies (The Information)
Texas Instruments says it is nearing recovery after Q3 sales fell for the eighth straight quarter to $4.15B, down 8.4% YoY, and projects Q4 sales below est. (Ian King/Bloomberg)
Foursquare plans to sunset its City Guide app on December 15, 2024 to focus on check-in app Swarm, reversing a 2014 decision to split its services into two apps (Sarah Perez/TechCrunch)
